com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.search

Interface FastProperties


  • @ProviderType
public interface FastProperties
    OSGi Service interface to composed lists (usually for Granite DataSources) of JCR properties that have/have not been optimized for AEM search..

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FAST 
      static String SLOW

    • Method Detail

      • getFastProperties

        List<String> getFastProperties(String indexConfigFlagPropertyName)
        Checks if the /oak:index/damAssetLucene index (or whatever may be overridden via FastPropertiesImpl OSGi Config) has a indexRule property config with the a property named indexConfigFlagPropertyName set to true. If it does, this propertyName (ie. jcr:content/metadata/dc:title) is added to the return list.
        Parameters:
        indexConfigFlagPropertyName - the oak index property name that acts as the true/false flag to check.
        Returns:
        a list of property paths as who are configured with @{param indexConfigFlagPropertyName} set to `true`

      • getDeltaProperties

        List<String> getDeltaProperties(Collection<String> fastProperties,
                                Collection<String> otherProperties)
        Parameters:
        fastProperties - a list relative property paths that are considered to be fast.
        otherProperties - a list of other relative property paths.
        Returns:
        the delta between the fastProperties and the otherProperties.

      • getFastLabel

        String getFastLabel(String label)
        Parameters:
        label - the label text
        Returns:
        the FASE icon suffixed with the label.

      • getSlowLabel

        String getSlowLabel(String label)
        Parameters:
        label - the label text
        Returns:
        the SLOW icon suffixed with the label.
